titles.title: A bill to require the Secretary of Commerce to conduct an assessment and analysis relating to the decline in the business formation rate in the United States.
Enhancing Entrepreneurship for the 21st Century Act
Enhancing Entrepreneurship for the 21st Century Act
Enhancing Entrepreneurship for the 21st Century Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

bill.summary:
Enhancing Entrepreneurship for the 21st Century Act
This bill requires the Department of Commerce to conduct an assessment and analysis of the reasons underlying the decreasing rate of formation of new businesses (i.e., startups) in the United States.
